thread.section_title: Multitrip Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Multitrip | www.multitrip.com
thread.title: William Johnston

author: William Johnston
title: William Johnston
text: I have renewed this policy (Premuim plus) for the last 3 years as it offers everything I need. I have had to claim on it once when I ruptured my spleen on a ski trip and was hospitalised. Multitrip dealt with my claim exceedingly well and even paid for a taxi from Grenoble to Geneva and for my mother to fly out to Geneva to accompany me home. Can't ask for better service!
